definition: father's elder brother/term of respect for older man/CL:個|个[ge4]
father's elder brother/senior/paternal elder uncle/eldest of brothers/respectful form of address/Count, third of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]

sentences.english: Is your uncle a high school principal ?
sentences.chinese: 你的伯父是中学校长吗？

sentences.english: Look at uncle writes, is quite comfortable.
sentences.chinese: 看着伯父写的字，就是挺舒服。

sentences.english: Wang Zun from the dead father, raised by his uncle.
sentences.chinese: 王尊从小死去父亲，由他的伯父抚养长大。

sentences.english: I went there with my uncle and aunt last month.
sentences.chinese: 上个月我跟我的伯父与伯母去了那里。

sentences.english: Great Uncle Algie was so pleased he bought me my toad.
sentences.chinese: 我的阿尔吉伯父一时高兴，还买了一只蟾蜍送给我呢。

sentences.english: He bragged that he had a rich uncle.
sentences.chinese: 他夸言有一位富有的伯父。

sentences.english: My uncle bought a one-eyed horse for 300 dollars .
sentences.chinese: 我伯父花三百美元买一匹一只眼的马。

sentences.english: I have never seen my uncle happier.
sentences.chinese: 我从未看到我伯父像现在这般快乐幸福。

sentences.english: My uncle was the mayor of Memphis.
sentences.chinese: 我伯父是孟菲斯市市长。

sentences.english: He did not have any kinder feelings for those who were much nearer to him than his uncle.
sentences.chinese: 对于比伯父更亲的人，马克思亦毫无慈心。

sentences.english: I can understand why my uncle felt that trouble was coming to him here.
sentences.chinese: 我能理解伯父为何在这儿时总是觉得要大难临头了。

sentences.english: BENVOLIO My noble uncle, do you know the cause?
sentences.chinese: 本沃利奥我尊敬的伯父，您知道他忧郁的病因吗？

sentences.english: My uncle is a professor in this university.
sentences.chinese: 我的伯父是这所大学的一名教授。

definition: wife of father's elder brother/aunt/(polite form of address for a woman who is about the age of one's mother)/CL:個|个[ge4]
older male cousin via female line
elder brother/term of respect for a man of about the same age
great uncle/grandfather's younger brother/husband's father's younger brother
